Posts.Content: Apr 28, 2010 08:03PM jodi4lsu wrote: thank you soooo much! is hormonal therapy given to women who have had a total hysterectomy? i had ovarian problems and had everything taken out a couple of years ago. this is all totally new territory for me. luckily i will be asleep for the surgery tomorrow so that won't be a problem. good thing too ,since i can't sleep tonite....I have read a lot of wonderful stories on this site and that gives me a lot of hope....you seem so strong. thanks for the good wishes, but if it turns out to be cancer (gulp...can't even type the word) I know where to turn!!!

Ductogram was inconclusive due to the dye infiltrating the breast tissue. Now tomorrow morning having excisional biopsy and terminal duct excision. Surgeon concerned about DCIS. WHAT NEXT?
